alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 3:41PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dorchester County through 445 PM EDT... At 341 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harmony, or 9 miles north of Hurlock, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hurlock around 425 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Galestown, Brookview, Eldorado and East New Market. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Be prepared for rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
